title: Emerald Kundan Jhumka - పచ్చ కుందన్ జుంకాలు
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features a central Emerald gemstone (approx. 0.5 carats) of vivid green hue and brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. High-quality gold ensures lasting shine and value.
features: Traditional bell-shaped Jhumka design adorned with intricate filigree work and studded with shimmering CZ stones. The top features a floral motif with an emerald center. Delicate gold beads gracefully dangle from the bottom, adding a touch of playful elegance. Embodying the essence of South Indian craftsmanship with a touch of modern sparkle.
colors: Dominant gold tone with vibrant green from the emerald and sparkling white from the CZ stones.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also suitable for half-saree functions (Langa Voni function) and temple visits. Can add a touch of elegance to modern cocktail parties as well.
description: This Emerald Kundan Jhumka perfectly marries traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The use of high-quality 22K gold and vibrant emeralds ensures lasting value and a luxurious look. The intricate filigree work and delicate dangling beads showcase exceptional craftsmanship, making it a cherished heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a unique luster and traditional appeal.
